done.title: Body measured and saved.
done.description: Your body proportions calibration is complete!

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Place a chair directly behind you inside your play space. <1></1>Be prepared to sit down during the autobone setup.
preparation.gotoNext: I am in front of a chair

putTrackersOn.title: Put on your trackers
putTrackersOn.procedure: To calibrate your proportions, we're gonna use the <1></1>trackers you just assigned. Put on all your trackers, <3></3>you can see which are which in the figure to the right.
putTrackersOn.gotoNext: I have all my trackers on

recording.title: Recording in progress...
recording.standUp: Sit on a chair then stand up.
recording.twistUpperBodyLeftThenBendRight: Twist upper body left, then bend right.
recording.twistUpperBodyRightThenBendLeft: Twist upper body right, then bend left.
recording.doNotMoveYourHeels: Ensure your heels do not move during recording!

startRecording.title: Get ready to move
startRecording.description: We're now going to record some specific poses and <1></1>moves. These will be prompted in the next screen. <3></3>Be ready to start when the button is pressed!
startRecording.doNotMoveYourHeels: Make sure you do not move your heels, they must stay at the same place while recording.

verifyResult.title: Verify results
verifyResult.description: Check the results below, do they look correct?

automaticPropotions.title: Measure your body
automaticPropotions.description: For SlimeVR trackers to work, we need to know the length of your bones. <1></1>This short calibration will measure it for you.

connectTracker.title: Connect trackers
connectTracker.description: Now onto the fun part, connecting all the trackers! <1></1>Simply connect all that aren't connected yet, through a USB port.

enterVr.title: Time to enter VR!
enterVr.description: Put on all your trackers and then enter VR!

autoMount.title: Mount calibration!
autoMount.description: This feature isn't done, just choose manual mounting.

manualMount.title: Manual Mounting
manualMount.description: Click on every tracker and select which way they are mounted

mountSelection.title: Where do you want this tracker to be?

resetTutorial.description: This feature isn't done, just press continue

assignTracker.title: Assign trackers
assignTracker.description: Let's choose which tracker goes where. Click on a location where you want to place a tracker

trackerSelection.whichTrackerToAssignTo: Which tracker to assign to the {{bodyPart}}?

wifiCreds.title: Input WiFi credentials
wifiCreds.description: The Trackers will use these credentials to connect wirelessly<1></1>please use the credentials that you are currently connected to
